rooms.notes: Two-car garage allocated with dedicated spaces

openings.notes: Large windows for natural light, Vastu compliant positioning

features.description: Bohemian garden courtyard featuring native plants and seating area
Overlooks the courtyard, ensuring a relaxing atmosphere

notes: Design incorporates Bohemian aesthetic with warm colors and artisanal finishes.
Vastu principles followed: living room oriented east, kitchen west, bedroom north (on upper floor) to enhance positive energy flow.
Central courtyard acts as the heart of the home promoting natural ventilation and light.
